summary: Temporal SDK Core has a transitive dependency vulnerability (CVE-2023-22895) in bzip2 0.4.3 that allows denial of service via integer overflow. The vulnerability has been fixed in bzip2 0.4.4, and the dependency was updated long ago.
userImpact: Users of temporal-sdk-core 0.1.0 are exposed to a denial of service vulnerability that could crash the application when processing large files.
rootCause: Integer overflow in mem.rs of bzip2 0.4.3 when handling large files
proposedFix: Upgrade bzip2 from 0.4.3 to 0.4.4 or later
resolutionDetails: Dependency was updated to resolve the vulnerability
keyQuote: Dependency has updated a very long time ago.
